summary: Branding appears updated to “Digital Asset Vault” in the Dashboard hero and Header. A local, persistent Deposit/Withdrawal History feature was added via a new TransactionHistory component and useTxHistory hook, with add-entry integration in deposit/withdraw flows and status polling. Some additional UI/theme/metadata changes were also introduced that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Global visual/theme overhaul (new professional blue/teal palette, additional CSS variables, gradients, and styling changes) beyond the requested branding copy update.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to update branding text and add transaction history; it did not request a theme redesign.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed extensive boot fallback and additional meta tags (e.g., build-id) in index.html beyond updating the app title/branding.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request boot fallback UI changes or deployment verification metadata.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed behavior described as wallet-agnostic messaging, enhanced error extraction, read-only JSON-RPC fallback, and balance fallback strategy (per file summaries).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope was branding copy + local transaction history UI; these broader Web3/balance UX enhancements were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer changes including attribution, UTM tracking params, build version display (per file summaries).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not mention Footer attribution/tracking/build version display.
